attributes.action: Stop the Normalising of the Porn and Sex Industries. Introduce Regulation of Lad's Mags and Lap Dancing. Educate over the Harm of Media Stereotyping. Uphold International Obligations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce Regulation over the 'unrecognised' branches of the Porn and Sex Industry - such as Lad's Mags  and The Sport (currently unregulated) and Lap Dancing (currently licensed like pubs). Introduce wide-spread Public and School's Gender Respect Education Campaigns  over the Realities of the Porn and Sex Industries. Uphold International Obligations which state Media Objectification and Pornography  promote Belief Systems that Harm Women, leading to Discrimination and Violence.
